cascade.text: update - afp: an unnamed police source says the killing of the policewoman in #paris on thursday is linked to the #charliehebdo attack
@SkyNewsBreak wow and you were so sure there was no connection despite having no info. Tell us the news not your view as news. Numpties.
@SkyNewsBreak of course it was going to be linked, something needs done before they take over the world !!
@SkyNewsBreak I'd rather wait for official confirmation than your scaremongering speculative social media sourcing news. #givefacts #unnamed
@SkyNewsBreak at least it hasn't been forgotten... there's been so little coverage, no mention of finding the shooter that escaped!!
